meanings.sent1: The sphenoidal bone supports the structure of the skull.
meanings.sent2: Doctors studied the sphenoidal bone to understand its role in the head.
meanings.sent3: The sphenoidal bone went to a party with the other bones and told jokes.
meanings.sent4: Her determination was as strong as the sphenoidal bone in her head.
meanings.sent5: The sphenoidal bone, like a sturdy pillar, held up the roof of the skull.

meanings.sent1: The sphenoidal rock was perfect for splitting into two pieces.
meanings.sent2: She found a sphenoidal piece of cake that was cut into a triangular shape.
meanings.sent3: The sphenoidal cheese wedge rolled off the table and onto the floor.
meanings.sent4: His narrow-minded thinking was as sharp as a sphenoidal knife.
meanings.sent5: The sphenoidal doorstop kept the door from slamming shut.
